message_1: Consider the set A = {1, 3, 5, 7} and the set B = {2, 4, 6, 8}. Find the union of the two sets, A and B.
message_2:
The union of two sets A and B, denoted as A ∪ B, is the set of all elements that are in A, in B, or in both. In this case, the union of sets A and B is:

A ∪ B = {1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8}
